title: Damaged and the Dragon
description: HEAT ღ HUMOR ღ HEABailey Johansson is the redneck princess of the Reapers Motorcycle Club. Desperate to fall in love, she won’t settle for just any guy. Bailey wants Nick, but he isn’t making it easy for her.Nick Davies grew up in a life of violence. Cage fighting as "Dragon" provides money and willing girls, but he only craves the sister of his nemesis. Love might come easily, but trust proves to be a struggle.Can the spoiled princess find a way to heal the hurt boy inside the man she loves?"Damaged and the Dragon" contains graphic sexual content, violent situations, and harsh language. The book is only appropriate for adult readers age 18+.
author: Bijou Hunter
